comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: John Needles Bentley (March 8, 1895 – October 24, 1969) was a professional baseball player. He was a left-handed pitcher over parts of nine seasons (1913–1916, 1923–1927) with the Washington Senators, New York Giants and Philadelphia Phillies. [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/6011901144/in/photostream/]

comment._content: This photo is fascinating - it is so clear and sharp - yet so old. Brilliant
